001package com.github.sormuras.bach.builder;
002
003import com.github.sormuras.bach.Bach;
004import com.github.sormuras.bach.Grabber;
005import com.github.sormuras.bach.ToolCall;
006import com.github.sormuras.bach.ToolFinder;
007import com.github.sormuras.bach.ToolRun;
008import com.github.sormuras.bach.internal.ModuleDescriptorSupport;
009import com.github.sormuras.bach.internal.ModuleFinderSupport;
010import com.github.sormuras.bach.internal.PathSupport;
011import java.io.File;
012import java.lang.module.ModuleDescriptor;
013import java.lang.module.ModuleFinder;
014import java.nio.file.Files;
015import java.nio.file.Path;
016import java.util.ArrayList;
017import java.util.List;
018import java.util.Optional;
019import java.util.function.UnaryOperator;
020import java.util.stream.Collectors;
021
022/** An API for building modular Java projects using conventional source file tree layouts. */
023public sealed interface Conventional {
024
025  /** Conventional module space descriptor. */
026  record Space(
027      Optional<String> name,
028      List<ModuleUnit> moduleUnits,
029      List<String> moduleSourcePaths,
030      List<Path> modulePaths,
031      Path destinationDirectory) {
032
033    private List<String> modules() {
034      return moduleUnits.stream().map(ModuleUnit::name).toList();
035    }
036
037    private Space units(List<ModuleUnit> units) {
038      return new Space(
039          name, List.copyOf(units), moduleSourcePaths, modulePaths, destinationDirectory);
040    }
041
042    private Space withUnit(ModuleUnit unit) {
043      var units = new ArrayList<>(this.moduleUnits);
044      units.add(unit);
045      return units(units);
046    }
047
048    /** Copy-and-add one or more elements to the specified component. */
049    private Space withModulePath(Path path, Path... more) {
050      var modulePaths = new ArrayList<>(this.modulePaths);
051      modulePaths.add(path);
052      if (more.length > 0) modulePaths.addAll(List.of(more));
053      return new Space(
054          name, moduleUnits, moduleSourcePaths, List.copyOf(modulePaths), destinationDirectory);
055    }
056  }
057
058  /** Conventional module information unit. */
059  record ModuleUnit(String name, Optional<String> main, List<Path> resources) {
060    public static ModuleUnit named(String name) {
061      return new ModuleUnit(name, Optional.empty(), List.of());
062    }
063
064    public ModuleUnit main(String main) {
065      return new ModuleUnit(name, Optional.ofNullable(main), resources);
066    }
067
068    public ModuleUnit resource(Path path, Path... more) {
069      var resources = new ArrayList<>(this.resources);
070      resources.add(path);
071      if (more.length > 0) resources.addAll(List.of(more));
072      return new ModuleUnit(name, main, resources);
073    }
074  }
075
076  /** Conventional project builder. */
077  record Builder(Bach bach, Space space) implements Conventional {
078
079    public Builder dependentSpace(String name) {
080      if (name.equals(space.name.orElse("?")))
081        throw new IllegalArgumentException("name collision: " + name);
082
083      var dependent = new BuilderFactory(bach).conventional(name).space();
084      return new Builder(bach, dependent.withModulePath(getModulesDirectory()));
085    }
086
087    public Builder withModule(String name, String... more) {
088      var units = new ArrayList<ModuleUnit>();
089      units.add(ModuleUnit.named(name));
090      for (var next : more) units.add(ModuleUnit.named(next));
091      return new Builder(bach, space.units(units));
092    }
093
094    public Builder withModule(String name, UnaryOperator<ModuleUnit> operator) {
095      return new Builder(bach, space.withUnit(operator.apply(ModuleUnit.named(name))));
096    }
097
098    public void grab(Grabber grabber, String... externalModules) {
099      grabber.grabExternalModules(externalModules);
100      grabber.grabMissingExternalModules();
101    }
102
103    public void compile() {
104      compile(ToolCall.Composer.identity());
105    }
106
107    public void compile(ToolCall.Composer javacComposer) {
108      compile(javacComposer, ToolCall.Composer.identity());
109    }
110
111    public void compile(ToolCall.Composer javacComposer, ToolCall.Composer jarComposer) {
112      var size = space.moduleUnits.size();
113      var plurals = size == 1 ? "" : "s";
114      var name = space.name.orElse("Java");
115      bach.logCaption("Compile %d conventional %s module%s".formatted(size, name, plurals));
116
117      var javac = ToolCall.of("javac");
118      javac.with("--module", String.join(",", space.modules()));
119      javac.with("--module-source-path", String.join(File.pathSeparator, space.moduleSourcePaths));
120      if (!getModulePaths().isEmpty()) javac.with("--module-path", getModulePaths());
121      javac.with("-d", getClassesDirectory());
122      bach.run(javacComposer.apply(javac));
123
124      var jars = new ArrayList<ToolCall>();
125      for (var unit : space.moduleUnits) jars.add(generateJarCall(unit, jarComposer));
126      bach.run("directories", dir -> dir.with("clean").with(getModulesDirectory()));
127      jars.parallelStream().forEach(bach::run);
128    }
129
130    public void document(ToolCall.Composer javadocComposer) {
131      var api = bach.path().workspace(space.name.orElse(""), "documentation", "api");
132      var javadoc = ToolCall.of("javadoc");
133      javadoc.with("--module", String.join(",", space.modules()));
134      javadoc.with(
135          "--module-source-path", String.join(File.pathSeparator, space.moduleSourcePaths));
136      if (!getModulePaths().isEmpty()) javadoc.with("--module-path", getModulePaths());
137      javadoc.with("-d", api);
138      bach.run(javadocComposer.apply(javadoc));
139
140      var jar =
141          ToolCall.of("jar")
142              .with("--create")
143              .with("--file", api.getParent().resolve("api.zip"))
144              .with("--no-manifest")
145              .with("-C", api, ".");
146      bach.run(jar);
147    }
148
149    public void link(ToolCall.Composer jlinkComposer) {
150      var image = bach.path().workspace(space.name.orElse(""), "image");
151      var jlink = ToolCall.of("jlink");
152      jlink.with("--output", image);
153      jlink.with("--add-modules", String.join(",", space.modules()));
154      jlink.with("--module-path", List.of(getModulesDirectory(), bach.path().externalModules()));
155      bach.run("directories", run -> run.with("delete").with(image));
156      bach.run(jlinkComposer.apply(jlink));
157    }
158
159    public void runAllTests() {
160      var name = space.name.orElse("this");
161      bach.logCaption("Run all tests in %s space".formatted(name));
162      var moduleFinder = getRuntimeModuleFinder();
163      for (var module : space.modules()) {
164        if (ModuleFinderSupport.findMainClass(moduleFinder, module).isPresent()) {
165          runModule(moduleFinder, module, ToolCall.Composer.identity(), bach.printer()::print);
166        }
167        var toolFinder = ToolFinder.of(moduleFinder, true, module);
168        runTool(toolFinder, "test", ToolCall.Composer.identity(), bach.printer()::print);
169        if (toolFinder.find("junit").isPresent()) runJUnit(toolFinder, module);
170      }
171    }
172
173    public void runModule(String module, ToolCall.Composer composer) {
174      runModule(getRuntimeModuleFinder(), module, composer, bach.printer()::print);
175    }
176
177    public void runModule(
178        ModuleFinder finder, String module, ToolCall.Composer composer, ToolRun.Visitor verifier) {
179      var call = composer.apply(ToolCall.module(finder, module));
180      var run = bach.run(call);
181      verifier.accept(run);
182    }
183
184    public void runTool(String tool, ToolCall.Composer composer) {
185      var toolFinder = ToolFinder.of(getRuntimeModuleFinder(), true);
186      runTool(toolFinder, tool, composer, bach.printer()::print);
187    }
188
189    public void runTool(
190        ToolFinder finder, String tool, ToolCall.Composer composer, ToolRun.Visitor visitor) {
191      for (var provider : finder.list(tool)) {
192        var singleton = ToolFinder.of(provider);
193        var call = composer.apply(ToolCall.of(singleton, tool));
194        var run = bach.run(call);
195        visitor.accept(run);
196      }
197    }
198
199    public void runJUnit(String module) {
200      var toolFinder = ToolFinder.of(getRuntimeModuleFinder(), true, module);
201      runJUnit(toolFinder, module);
202    }
203
204    public void runJUnit(ToolFinder finder, String module) {
205      runJUnit(finder, module, ToolCall.Composer.identity(), ToolRun.Visitor.noop());
206    }
207
208    public void runJUnit(
209        ToolFinder finder, String module, ToolCall.Composer composer, ToolRun.Visitor visitor) {
210      var reports = bach.path().workspace(space.name.orElse(""), "reports", "junit", module);
211      var junit =
212          ToolCall.of(finder, "junit")
213              .with("--select-module", module)
214              .with("--reports-dir", reports);
215      var call = composer.apply(junit);
216      var run = bach.run(call);
217      visitor.accept(run);
218    }
219
220    private ToolCall generateJarCall(ModuleUnit unit, ToolCall.Composer jarComposer) {
221      var file = unit.name + ".jar";
222      var jar = ToolCall.of("jar");
223      jar.with("--create");
224      jar.with("--file", getModulesDirectory().resolve(file));
225      unit.main.ifPresent(main -> jar.with("--main-class", main));
226      var composed = jarComposer.apply(jar);
227      composed.with("-C", getClassesDirectory().resolve(unit.name), ".");
228      for (var resource : unit.resources) {
229        var path = resource.isAbsolute() ? resource : bach.path().root().resolve(resource);
230        if (Files.isDirectory(path)) composed.with("-C", path, ".");
231        else composed.with(path);
232      }
233      return composed;
234    }
235
236    private List<Path> getModulePaths() {
237      var paths = new ArrayList<>(space.modulePaths());
238      var externalModules = bach.path().externalModules();
239      if (Files.isDirectory(externalModules) && !paths.contains(externalModules))
240        paths.add(externalModules);
241      return List.copyOf(paths);
242    }
243
244    private Path getClassesDirectory() {
245      return bach.path().workspace(space.name.orElse(""), "classes");
246    }
247
248    private Path getModulesDirectory() {
249      return bach.path().workspace().resolve(space.destinationDirectory);
250    }
251
252    private ModuleFinder getRuntimeModuleFinder() {
253      var paths = new ArrayList<Path>();
254      paths.add(getModulesDirectory());
255      paths.addAll(getModulePaths());
256      return ModuleFinder.of(paths.toArray(Path[]::new));
257    }
258  }
259
260  /** {@return a build program for the conventional unnamend space} */
261  static String generateUnnamedSpaceBuildProgram() {
262    var names =
263        PathSupport.find(Path.of(""), 99, PathSupport::isModuleInfoJavaFile).stream()
264            .map(ModuleDescriptorSupport::parse)
265            .map(ModuleDescriptor::name)
266            .sorted()
267            .toList();
268    var modules =
269        names.isEmpty()
270            ? "/* here be one or more module names */"
271            : names.stream().map(name -> '"' + name + '"').collect(Collectors.joining(", "));
272    return """
273          import com.github.sormuras.bach.*;
274
275          class build {
276            public static void main(String... args) {
277              try (var bach = new Bach(args)) {
278                var space = bach.builder().conventional().withModule(%s);
279                space.compile(javac -> javac.with("-Xlint").with("-Werror"), jar -> jar.with("--verbose"));
280                // space.runModule("MODULE[/MAINCLASS]", run -> run.with("--dry-run"));
281                // space.document(javadoc -> javadoc.with("-notimestamp").with("-Xdoclint:-missing"));
282                // space.link(jlink -> jlink.with("--launcher", "NAME=MODULE[/MAINCLASS]"));
283              }
284            }
285          }
286          """
287        .formatted(modules);
288  }
289
290  /** {@return a build program for a project using {@code main} and {@code test} space layout} */
291  static String generateMainAndTestSpaceBuildProgram() {
292    var mainModules = "/* here be one or more main modules */";
293    var testModules = "/* here be one or more test modules */";
294    return """
295          import com.github.sormuras.bach.*;
296
297          class build {
298            public static void main(String... args) {
299              try (var bach = new Bach(args)) {
300
301                var main = bach.builder().conventional("main").withModule(%s);
302                main.compile(javac -> javac.with("-Xlint").with("-Werror"), jar -> jar.with("--verbose"));
303
304                bach.logCaption("Perform automated checks");
305                var test = main.dependentSpace("test").withModule(%s);
306                // test.grab(bach.grabber(...), "org.junit.jupiter", "org.junit.platform.console");
307                test.compile(javac -> javac.with("-g").with("-parameters"));
308                test.runAllTests();
309
310                // bach.logCaption("Document API and link main modules into a custom runtime image");
311                // main.document(javadoc -> javadoc.with("-notimestamp").with("-Xdoclint:-missing"));
312                // main.link(jlink -> jlink.with("--launcher", "NAME=MODULE[/MAINCLASS]"));
313              }
314            }
315          }
316          """
317        .formatted(mainModules, testModules);
318  }
319}
